me pradhana bhumikawan hathara wanne ; yauwanathwaye elipaththe sitimin nidahase ha palanaye antha dekata madiwa wishmitha aragalayaka yedena wishwawidyala sisuwiyakawana, tharuna jawayen piri rehana jiwath wimata wenath kisidu margayak nomathi bawin chithra pasalaka niruwath modalayak lesa peni sitina thama wandambau mawa wisin thamata wiwaha wimata yojana karana lada dhanawath pirimiyath wenath aagamakata jathiyakata ayath bawin kisidineka thamata ayithi karagatha nohaki pemwathath athara anagathaya pilibanda aragalayaka pataluna yowun madayen okanda wu lila wiwaha wi daruwan thideneku ladada kisidineka thama samiyagen aadarayak nolath, samiyata awashya wana hamawiteka depa wiwrutha kirimata sudanamwa sitiya yuthu birindak lesa wuwada hama dinayakama thama ahimi wu aadaraya gana nawum balaporoththuwak samaga jiwithaya patangannata aragalayaka yedena shrin madi wayas wandambauwakwa thamanata urumawu depala aaraksha kota gena eya thama aadayam margaya karaganimin, siyallanata sewayan sapayamin, bala mahalu samata aadarshamath wadihitiya wemin thamange nama pawa amathaka kara gath namuth thama ahimiwu yauwanaye aashawan rahase kiyawana laba shrungarathmaka prema katha haraha thrupthimathkaragannata uthsaha karana 55 hawiridi uusha ya.
